edge_1: Mackenzie Davis is cast as Mindy Park in the movie.
edge_2: The Media Action Network for Asian-Americans (MANAA) criticized the casting of white actress Mackenzie Davis as Mindy Park, whom it said author Andy Weir had described as Korean-American.

edge_1: Mackenzie Davis is cast as Mindy Park in the movie.
edge_2: Weir said in October 2015 he perceived Mindy Park as Korean but said he did not explicitly write her as Korean. He also dismissed criticism of Ejiofor's casting, saying that Kapoor is 'an American. Americans come from lots of different sources. You can be Venkat Kapoor and black.'
